text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump Why would anyone listen to #TrumpIsNotADoctor or you?  There are over 13K new cases of #COVID19 in the USA Today alone, with over 800 new deaths (today alone).  There is NO SAFELY opening up America without a vaccine, you #COVIDIOT now go #WashYourHands https://t.co/k9oG6oyN59
